content: I may seem confident, but I get extremely nervous speaking in front of people. My hands tremble, I get all tongue-tied, and sometimes I don't even know what I'm saying myself.
translations: ita:Posso sembrare sicura di me, ma divento estremamente nervosa a parlare davanti alla gente. Mi tremano le mani, divento c
